messages: This information could have been shared 1 month ago .
You guys didn't even give holiday on Holi . What a shame .
Its is an unreasonable and irrational announcement and it should be taken back.
What will be the day orders during  milan
A lot of people are going back home and this is informed a week prior to Milan. Never has this ever happened. Shame.
Sir if this is to make the students attend milan, then let me assure you no one is going to turn up for milan.
A very bad way to prevent the students from going home. Too bad the management realised this one week prior to Milan. SHAME!!
What they expect forcing students to stay here will increase their registration ....😂😂😂😂😂
This account has been suspended due to use of foul language.
This account has been suspended due to use of foul language.
It should have been informed earlier!!!
I am here for the comments
It's a very shameful act of srm if the notice would have been a week prior notice problem would have been there but this is really a shame
Strict action will be taken against all those who are using inappropriate language.
This account has been suspended due to use of foul language.
How insane u r management ppl are!!😤😏
Informing this so late is ethically incorrect.
Shame shame shame shame shame shame shame shame shame shame
This is an extremely unreasonable and irrational thing to do. Especially after it was clearly given as a holiday in the academic calendar.
The management can't inform this before and now you threaten us by saying strict action will be taken .
Shame shame....I regret studying in this college.....
Don't make me hate my own college

SRM does this everytime. Guess who didn't book his flight tickets?
I was so confident SRM can never fail to disappoint their beloved students.
Sir please have a review of your decision
Possibly the worst management decision made by SRM so far
This account has been suspended due to use of foul language.
Firstly you guys don't give holidays and then if a child plans to go back home during the college fest u guys do this ....Which college tries to make attendance for a cultural fest mandatory
I don't have money for common registration & Nuclea....So how can I participate in Milan...?? Please tell SRM...What should I do ??? 😂😂😂😂

I think not a single student should attend any event this should students' announcement 
BOYCOTT MILAN
No No No SRM , No Learn,No Leap, No Lead...😂😂
Boycott EXAM FEES. Let's see what you can do without money
Hey guys your names and your registration numbers are visible to the Director sir.
Many of us are going back home during milan.. don't you think it's a bit irresponsible to inform us just 1 week before..considering the rates of flight tickets and stuff.

Based on our announced academic planner, most of us have already made our plans to travel during the first week of February, which would be extremely difficult to modify / cancel at the last moment, involving a huge costs as well. 
Hope, you will kindly appreciate and allow us to proceed as per our plans, as a special consideration.
Thanks in advance, with best regards,
this college is going to be known for unprofessional management #BOYCOTTMILAN
What about the day orders for those days?  (not updated still in wisopt calendar) . Attendance will be given for the entire day if we attend those 2 hr classes?
We will not take part in any of the  milan activity...
Holi ka b choti nahi diya

Everything is ok but just try to make space for holi in your busy schedule. We stay away from homes and these festivals allow us to have some fun . They are energising and help us cope up with stress.
The foolish thing in our country is this only there is an attendance for fest
Milan is flop is there any doubt in that
If they want to take class then take full day class or else give us a holiday, it is waste of time to come for 3 hrs
By this decision both who are taking part in Milan as well as who are leaving will suffer

This is a rash and irrational decision. Sir please reconsider. This is very irresponsible of the management. This very unethical and unprofessional. Please review your decision. Don't cover a mistake with another mistake.
Last year Milan is in 5th position and I need not say in which position it will be this year
Share information at the very end moment and watch the world burn.
Campus management is only responsible for the failure consequences of milan
Students were depressed and how can the management think that the Milan would become successful

Please reconsider this decision.  As you can see,  there are now peoole who are thinking of boycotting Milan. This will be counterproductive to whatever your initial plans for Milan were. And also, no one is too thrilled about rescheduling travel plans and losing money in the process. Thank you.
I request once again to the director sir and management to look over it again.

If this app could really eliminate the gap between the staffs, management and we students then some good decisions would be surely made. Or else its just an another gimmick like evrything in our cntry
We are given so less holiday then again this is the only time we get holidays. You are informing us at the last week. We need to get refund for our cancelled flights.

For me its a two hours travel from home since I'm a dayscholar and for returning I have to go by train and then catch two buses and walk 1km home!!!!all this crap for only 3hrs for whole 9 days!!!I'll surely die!!!!
Not just me!!!!I'm telling this for every dayscholar in clg

It is really cheap strategy to play with attendance for attending Milan. And it is very sad that we student of SRM now cannot even trust acaedmic planner.....Genuine request to srm please remove acaedmic planner if you cannot follow it. #BoycottMilan
Why suddenly classes has been implemented. This is really a cheap strategy for making their own student to attend their own fest.
Please confirm if attendance for only first three hours or for the full day will be taken . As in EEE department people are telling different things

Dont no...why srm is stressing on students during ct's by keeping other classes and labs also...ok fine....now everyone is in mood of milan and some r going home....its upto students wish what to do and what not to do when srm management have published a specific calender for this semister.....no point when u yourself r not following that calender.....srm management should have mentioned in the calender itself in the starting of tgis semister...

C'mon for 2 hr attendance  should we travel 3 hrs. 
For doing this cheap trick .. u ppl can cancel milan and conduct normal classes and finish the semester 3 days earlier.
Since the administration has very kindly requested us students to maintain proper language in this group i will simply say...i agree with everyone who spoke up everything that i was feeling 😁
So shameful in terms of management...We have already booked tickets ...

This is very annoying. We have no holidays for Holi too which is such an important festival for us. Like 1000 times more important than Milan but no holidays. Now we're being asked to attend Milan which was previously holiday. I want to know if the management is mocking students by doing these ridiculous sudden announcements and causing them financial loss. Seriously, i expected better from this college. 
- a very disappointed SRM student
Being shown a non working day in both academia and wisopt,and after students booking expensive flight tickets back home,this decision is not fair.
Keep classes full day and no Milan required.....otherwise no class
This is why I hate srm
For what use is the academic planner if these retards at SRM cannot stick to it.

I'm proud of this University now I'll recommend everybody in my city to join this University so that everybody can see and experience what humiliation really is. Though they say raging is banned in the campus! No no it's only banned for the students, management has every right to do it and they have shown this time to time. 🙂
Sir,
I will attend every event of MILAN'18 if you can give the amount which I've paid (₹8000) in the flight tickets..(Paytm payments will not be appreciated)
Thankyou
#just_another_victim
Pls Ya I'm going on Friday itself wat is this give us hols

In order to enable students to participate in the milan YOU GUYS HAVE DONE THAT. BUT THATS NOT GONA HAPPEN
#boycottmilan

as if this college is run by MILAN! really bad in understanding human psychology. U thought if you do such thing we will attend MILAN but the truth is you lost both the value and respect. Management flaw at its best. #PoorSRM
We want holidays during Milan, this is unfair most of us have already got tickets to home and since our attendance is low we will not be able to compensate for it, please reverse the decision
Sir, but there were no regular class planned on these days according to your own planner. So how are those non-existing classes cancelled?

This is totally shameful about SRM. We expected better for this college.. 
#boycottMILAN
No problem guys... Mess with denge, malaria, typhoid or cancer or any other problem available in market... medical leave.. Better than loosing ticket price..😅 😅

Srm everytime proves that its the worst college
#worst_management
#boycotmilan
Boycott the University itself . Tell any junior not to join this institute .

It is very shameful of SRM doing this.now who is breaking the rules.
On what we should relay when our own academia is not followed by the college itself.
#boycott_milan
This is really shame .....We expected better from this college....Really feeling ashamed

First college which keeps classes on fest and on top of that informs us at the last moment
#boycottmilan
Very cheap and petty tactics by DSA .This will ruin their reputation .I will never join milan and  recommend everyone not to join DSA since they are bullies.
VIT is far better than SRM
Nothing will happen by putting your grievances here . Write/Call the S&CL Director , E&T Director and Chancellor . No one is going to listen in wisopt
#boycottmilan ...the least we can do is boycott Milan completely ...go watch movie or something ... Don't promote or help the fest in anyway ... These people are ruthless

People now watch as you see your attendance fall below 75%, get ready to get detention. And again enroll for the course(which is of course not free).  Enterpreneurs, see this business idea and learn. 
#boycottMilan
#shame
Then what for academic planner is made if you are changing it again and again according to your convinience
You should have informed atleast 1 month ago
Sir we will go to our home plzz don't conduct class on Milan time

We booked our tickets on the basis of Milan being a holiday as its put on the planner.
Then what is the need for the planner if plans keep changing??

These people call themselves a University. They teach us values and ethics. Hats off with my pants down. Now  they show their responsibilty towards us. They just understand money. Ethics is a myth here.

We should have been informed earlier about the changes so that we can plan accordingly , tickets for flights have already been booked this is really not the thing that should have happened .
No holiday for holi? Is it not a part of our country? What the fuck is this whole country has holiday but our top University Srm University has no holiday on Holi why the fuck
SRM is being racist as well as bully
We had 5 days holidays for pongal

But for 1 day for holi they had to keep classes my question is if you are trying to maintain and reserve your own culture turn this college into state college or do they feel that they are not a part of india anymore cause holi is celebrated all over India. Since the first day of college the management has tortured us

Last sem was limit they reduced our sem holidays to half a month just because the management was incompetent to create a good schedule and now this. If they that just going to classes make us einstein then they are the stupidmost people

We spend a lot of money on this college & we are not allowed to go to our own home and anyways milan is too boring its just another way of making money for srm afterall thats all they know-how to make money. #Boycottmilan

My suggestion to management is that please stop all these nonsence of milan and keep conducting all classes. Actually cancel all holidays possible cause aparently srm sets its own rules & regulations and doesn't need to think about student life cause we are just a bunch of fat moneybags to them. And lets do 365 days 24 hrs classes if that makes you bullies and monsters happy

Last minute decisions,calendar changed , 
U teach others management, is this some kind of joke
I guess this is how it turned into a crap, racist institute from University.
#Learn from somewhere else
#Leap yourself
#Lead by not following their path..
I just hate this college (its not a University anymore so can say that)

Shame on the management
They just want to choke down our voice so they can bully us as they wish and shameless DSA people just made a sudden decision based on few people. They are the only one who is going to attend the stupid Milan this time
It'll be a very big challenge for you people to conduct classes on holi. #karkedikhao
Is this a business strategy to raise funds for Milan?
Can't students have holidays because of this stupid strategy and we dont even have a holiday on holi but why do we get it in founders day...
Sab bolte the srm jaise tatti college mein nhi jaa, but mujhe toh teer apni g**nd mein lene ka shauk tha
First a guy will loose his 6k if he decides to stay here and cancel his ticket and then these people expect him to give fees for watching the so called fest I mean this is soooo shit logic
If north India can have pongal then why SRM can not have holi?? Are they too proud?? And they will teach us morals. #boycottholiclasses

#boycottmilan
And please pay my flight fees to make me stay here

No holi holiday? Joke or what, what u want u want us to stay here for what just to attend the useless lectures huh? It's a festival we all have right to celebrate it, it's our country's tradition, all colleges are closed but ours still open , in uttar Pradesh the colleges have 2 days holidays but here no holiday for holi. At least have some love for our country's​ rich history and tradition , let the students enjoy the festival, Holi is a day for us to celebrate to enjoy, no to come for the regular dose of boredom from the clg authorities , if this is not fascism then what u may call this?

Getting bullied by the management, first to compulsorily attend Saturday placement classes, then no holiday on Holi and during Milan. Really unacceptable. And lastly, unnecessarily stretching the semester exams, thus giving us le vacation time. Then they expect us to turn up right on the enrollment day. #BoycottHoliClasses  #BoycottMilan
#boycottmilan.. not a single holiday other than weekends in February. I suppose people think with their ass nowadays.
DSA guys what you doing when manegement is making such decisions...if u will be not with us....then close DSA...no one is helping the students...very had of srm
No respect for North Indian culture, I mean seriously is this a college or what?
See guys....lets boycott milan....even if we stay here and not go home...we will boycott milan...we will not participate in any events
Aravind Parthasarathy will find you and kill you if you don't give leave during Milan and give holiday on holi ... #parthaswag
